articles.title: The AMD Radeon RX 6800 XT takes the 3DMark Fire Strike world record from the NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3090 on stock cooling - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: AMD now holds the 3DMark Fire Strike world record, and with its second-fastest graphics card to boot. Impressively, the Radeon RX 6800 XT took the crown from the NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3090 with a reference cooler.
articles.content: We may still have the RX 6900 XT to come from AMD, but the RX 6800 XT has enough performance to claim the world record in 3DMark Fire Strike from NVIDIA's GeForce RTX 3090. Naturally, the RDNA2 card … [+916 chars]
